body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Places To Go             Places To Go          The museum is located approximately 4 blocks east of the Klondike Gold Rush visitor center. Wing Luke Museum of the Asian Pacific American Experience,  719 South King Street, Seattle, WA                Access via from downtown Seattle by Bainbridge State ferry and either private or public transportation from ferry terminal to site. Located at Pritchard Park 4192 Eagle Harbor Drive Bainbridge Island, WA 98110      Other NPS sites two or more hours from downtown Seattle.               Mount Rainier National Park 90 miles south of Seattle             : San Juan Island National Historical Park 120 miles north of Seattle             Olympic National Park 120 miles west of Seattle              North Cascades National Park 150 miles north of Seattle
title: Klondike Gold Rush - Seattle Unit National Historical Park: Places To Go
